metadata.title: CVE-2023-22602 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: When using Apache Shiro before 1.11.0 together with Spring Boot 2.6+, aspecially crafted HTTP request may cause an authentication bypass. Theauthentication bypass occurs when Shiro and Spring Boot are using differentpattern-matching techniques. Both Shiro and Spring Boot < 2.6 default toAnt style pattern matching. Mitigation: Update to Apache Shiro 1.11.0, orset the following Spring Boot configuration value:`spring.mvc.pathmatch.matching-strategy = ant_path_matcher`

criterions.comment: shiro package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
